tasks.task: Operating and managing a precision farming department in a tractor company.
subtasks: Discussing personal experience leading the precision farming division for 19 years.
Mentioning the current size of the department (two and a half people).
Describing the growth from part-time to full-time roles over three years.
Explaining the shift from a separate department to becoming more integrated into standard equipment.
Emphasizing the role of technicians in operating and maintaining precision farming equipment.
Discussing the capability of monitors to control tractors and monitor integration.
Highlighting the need for shutoff controls in expensive seed crops (e.g., seed corn).
Describing the benefits of new technologies for row shutoffs in planting operations.

tasks.task: Describing the application of precision farming techniques in specialty crop production.
subtasks: Mentioning the specialty crops and seed corn as examples.
Discussing the cost implications of seed corn and the importance of efficient planting.
Explaining the benefit of row shutoffs in saving inputs when not planting bull rows.
Stressing the simplification of operations with advanced technology for planting.
